teli natya wada muluwa da‘telinatya ha prathipaththi sampadanaya’ yana themawa yatathe wadamuluwak janamadhya ha prawruththi amathyanshaye lekam aacharya charitha herath mahathage pradhanathwayen pasugiyada (9) rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwe madhya sanwardhana madhyasthanaye nawa shrawanagarayedi pawathwini.mehidi prawina chithrapata adhyaksha aacharya dharmasena pathiraja, sinama, wedika, telinatya adhyaksha ha puwathpath kalawedi jayantha chandrasiri, prawina rangawedi chithrapata adhyaksha jaksan anthani saha rajaye prawruththi adhyaksha janaral mahacharya aariyarathna athugala yana mahathwarun wisin deshana pawathwana ladi.mema awasthawa sandaha sinama ha telinatya adhyakshawaru, nishpadakawaru athulu sinama ha telinatya kshethraye prawinayo rasak da sahabhagi wuha.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

ada thawath aluth dawasak.aluth mal paththiyak hadapu dawasak.mage malpaththiye ida thibune ekama eka kakulu dekakata witharak bawa mata danum dilayi thibune.eeth in eka kakulak witharak hudakala wela ahasa diha bala innawa.me awuruddeth mata mulu paththiyatama ekama kakulak witharada?man magenma ahuwa.ee langama paththiye hudakalawa wanemin hiti mage kulundul kakulen labuna as kona wakwechcha supurudu sinawe thaggen sathutu hith athiwa aluth mala dihawata haruna.
